body:
I currently have a simple MVC RedirectToAction action... 

return RedirectToAction("Edit", "Customers", new {Id = iNewId});

... which redirects to Cutomers/Edit/1

However Iâ€™d like to append some custom values to the URL which will get used by javascript, returning URLs such as Cutomers/Edit/1#Tab1

What is the best method of doing this?

Many thanks.
title: How can I add custom URL parameters to a MVC RedirectToAction
